clause_text: The family moved to Third and Wharton
The father took the team of horses back
The mother went to market
The father did not return home
The family moved to Third and Wharton
The father left the house
to return the team of horses
Someone threw a stone through the window
The narrator got the kids to safety
in the stairway

and a big stone crashed through the window

to look for her mother
